arts.ttl: What Arne Slot asked Darwin Nunez pre-match as Liverpool boss tells moment he 'would have loved'
arts.sum: Arne Slot was speaking after Liverpool beat Leipzig in the UEFA Champions League

arts.ttl: 'What I didn't like' - RB Leipzig boss makes Liverpool admission after Champions League loss
arts.sum: RB Leipzig boss Marco Rose was critical of his team after their Champions League loss to Liverpool on Wednesday evening

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez truth clear after body language claims as Liverpool to find out where they really stand
arts.sum: Ian Doyle provides analysis after Liverpool continue their fine start to the season under Arne Slot with Champions League victory at RB Leipzig

arts.ttl: Liverpool sparked into life by marginal call as RB Leipzig fluff their lines
arts.sum: Liverpool rode their luck in Germany as RB Leipzig were twice denied by the offside flag as Darwin Nunez's close range finish ensured the Reds picked up another three Champions League points

arts.ttl: Two more Liverpool absences explained as goalkeeper change sees teenager step up
arts.sum: Analysis of Liverpool Under-19s 3=1 defeat to RB Leipzig in the UEFA Youth League on Wednesday

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah substitution explained as Arsenal loom for Arne Slot's Liverpool
arts.sum: Arne Slot's reaction after Liverpool make it three straight Champions League victories by beating RB Leipzig 1-0 at the Red Bull Arena

arts.ttl: Arne Slot reveals what he told Darwin Nunez before striker's match-winning performance in Liverpool's 1-0 win over Red Bull Leipzig
arts.sum: Nunez, who has been forced to make do with substitute appearances this term, came in for the injured Diogo Jota at the Red Bull Arena and notched his second goal of the campaign.

arts.ttl: Slot praises 'dominant' Liverpool win over Leipzig
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot praises his side's performance after Liverpool secured a 1-0 win at RB Leipzig on match week three of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig 0-1 Liverpool: Player ratings as Reds secure third straight European win
arts.sum: Amadou Haidara forced Caoimhin Kelleher into an agile save with a powerful drive from outside the area and the Irish goalkeeper's poor clearance almost proved costly as Benjamin Sekso curled a shot inches wide in the 19th minute. Nunez could have doubled his tally just five minutes after opening the scoring but Peter Gulacsi produced an instinctive save to rebuff the Uruguayan's close-range header.

arts.ttl: 'Almost unbeatable' - so will Liverpool turn wins and records into trophies?
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot says records are nice but he would rather have trophies after his side's 11th win in 12 games.
